title: FS: T206 Sweet Cap 350 Nicholls - SGC50
author: bigwinnerx

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Sweet Cap 350 Nicholls - SGC50
posts.post_content:
Asking $50 paypal gift.  Check ok, too.  PP goods, pls cover the 3%

Just ventured out of my 2-3 grade range and will just keep my SGC 40 instead.  

[IMG]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8515/8545165847_d0ede70156_c.jpg[/IMG]

Here's the really big scan if you want a medical view.  Yes, there are some fibers trapped on the left side of the back.  No, they aren't from this card.  Yes, thanks SGC.  

[IMG]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8515/8545165847_1933bcb570_o.jpg[/IMG]
Price drop, lowest I'll go without just bequeathing it to my daughters.  :)
